title: 3 Idiots
summary: Three engineering students embark on a quest to find their missing friend, all the while reflecting on their college days and the pressures of the education system.

title: Like Stars on Earth
summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy troublemaker until a new art teacher discovers the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Swades
summary: A successful NASA scientist returns to his homeland to find his childhood nanny and ends up rediscovering his roots and the true meaning of life.

title: Rang De Basanti
summary: A group of university students are tasked with making a documentary about India's freedom fighters, leading them to reflect on their own lives and the state of the nation.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
summary: Three inseparable childhood friends navigate the ups and downs of life, love, and relationships as they transition from college to adulthood.

title: Lagaan
summary: Set in 1893, during the British Raj, a small village in India is challenged to a game of cricket by the British rulers, with the fate of the village at stake.

title: Barfi!
summary: A mute and deaf man embarks on a journey of love, exploring the challenges of his disability while finding himself entangled in a love triangle.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary: Three friends embark on a road trip in Spain, where they confront their past fears, experience unforgettable adventures, and discover the true meaning of life.

title: Section 375
summary: A young woman accuses a popular film director of sexual assault, leading to a complex legal battle that questions the meaning of consent.

title: Manto
summary: A biographical drama about the life of Urdu writer Saadat Hasan Manto, highlighting his struggles with his writing and his position in post-independence India.

title: Lootera
summary: A young man and woman fall in love, but a secret threatens to shatter their bond as they face betrayals and struggles that define their fates.

title: Omerta
summary: A gripping portrayal of the life of Omar Saeed Sheikh, a notorious terrorist involved in the 1994 kidnapping of British citizens and the 2002 kidnapping of Daniel Pearl.

title: Gulaal
summary: A political drama set against the backdrop of a university, depicting the rise of student-led protests and the political intrigue that follows.

title: 13B
summary: A man and his family are disturbed by a series of mysterious events linked to a television show, which may be connected to supernatural forces.

title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshi!
summary: Based on the iconic Bengali detective created by Saradindu Bandyopadhyay, Byomkesh Bakshi uncovers a web of conspiracies and mysteries in pre-independence India.

title: The Kashmir Files
summary: The film explores the exodus of Kashmiri Pandits from the Kashmir Valley during the 1990s, shedding light on the political and personal aspects of the tragedy.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
summary: An epic tale of crime, power, and revenge set in the coal mines of Wasseypur, spanning several decades and generations.

title: Tumbbad
summary: In 1918, a young man embarks on a quest to uncover the secret of a mythical treasure hidden in the cursed village of Tumbbad, while battling the supernatural forces guarding it.
